column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A 32 year old man died after his Prius crashed into a road divider at 3:20 am on Thursday
column4: 26 December 2019 on Monivong/Street 360 in Boeng Keng Kang 1.------The source said that the car was was driven at high speeds by a man called Tang Veasna
